summary: ENGINE SHUTS DOWN COMPLETELY WHEN ATTEMPTING TO PASS ANOTHER VEHICLE OR WHEN PEDAL IS DEPRESSED ALL THE WAY TO THE FLOOR.  PROBLEM WENT ON FOR OVER A YEAR.  IT TOOK THREE DIFFERENT AUTHORIZED DEALERS BEFORE THE PROBLEM WAS LOCATED.  IT WAS FINALLY REPAIRED WHEN SERVICE MAN MODIFIED THROTTLE POSITION SENSOR.   *NLM
